person.persName: Heriford Preston (Lawrence County, Kentucky, and Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, and Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Arthur Preston and Nancy Preston. Married to Elizabeth Hunt Preston In Lawrence County on October 26, 1854. Father of Trimble Preston, Wellington Preston, and Mary Preston. Married to Susan Taylor Preston in Lawrence County on August 2, 1864. Stepfather of Susan Taylor. Farmer in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person, Dinah, in Floyd County in 1860.
